about_the_game:
It has gone too far. They could not control it. You are the only one left to stop the breach. Discover the secrets behind the anomalies and stop them from escaping the underground facility before it's too late!

Features

  • Immersive Experience: Realistic graphics powered by Unity 3D, well-crafted sounds and an eerie ambience.

  • Unique Enemies: Encounter various creatures with unique abilities.

  • Rich Storyline: Discover the story through visual hints and written documents scattered around the facility

  • Various Equipment: Use a variety of items scattered around the facility to progress, survive and eliminate the anomalies.

  • Intriguing Challenges: Puzzles that test your abilities under pressure and make use of unique mechanics.

  • Diverse Environments: Experience spine-chilling settings, each environment being creepier than the last one.

Q & A, Commonly asked question

Is this game just another asset flip?

The game environment is mostly built with commercial assets, but the creatures and some items are modelled for this project only. All the gameplay elements have been built from scratch. You can expect an unique horror experience, I really put in all my efforts to make The Facility Project perfect.

What platforms will the game be available on?

The game will initially be released on Windows. The game features controller support so console / steam deck releases will probably come soon after the official release. There might be support for Mac and Linux in the future.

How big is your team?

I am the only developer but I collaborate with others who assist me in creating 2D & 3D Art, music and more. You can find the complete credits within the game.

Who am I?

I'm a high school student and passionate indie game developer, known as 'Tudypie'. I developed multiple short games (some of which are horror) that I released for free on itch. I am working in the Unity Game Engine since 2019 and The Facility Project is my first big commercial project. I am hoping to build a community and launch more games in the future!

content_descriptors.notes: Includes mild violence and mild language.

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-11100HE Processor or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 250 1GB

  • Storage: 5 GB available space

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 or AMD FX™-9590 or better

short_description: The Facility Project is a survival horror game. Navigate the environments by using your photo camera to illuminate dark areas, uncover hidden messages, and evade lurking creatures. Are you truly trapped within the facility, or in something else entirely?
